## interleaveRows2d() function

Similar to `interleaveColumns2d`<!-- -->, but yields 2D grid coordinates in the order of interleaved rows with configurable `step` size (default: 2). I.e. returns rows in this order:

- 0, step, 2 \* step, 3 \* step... - 1, 2 \* step + 1, 3 \* step + 1... - etc.

 interleaveColumns2d

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function interleaveRows2d(cols: number, rows?: number, step?: number): Generator<[number, number], void, undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cols | <code>number</code> |  |
|  rows | <code>number</code> |  |
|  step | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Generator<[number, number], void, undefined>`
